caption.p: Average annual discharges and nutrient loads for the reference period using climate scenario data, shown as boxplots and observed climate data, shown as dots. The whiskers represent the min/max values, boxes the 25th/75th percentiles and thick lines the median values of SWIM outputs. On the left: Q av (mean flow), Q 50 (median flow), Q 90 (low flow), Q 10 (high flow), Q djf (winter flow), Q mam (spring flow), Q jja (summer flow), and Q son (autumn flow). On the right: NO 3-N (nitrate nitrogen), NH 4-N (ammonium nitrogen), and PO 4-P (phosphate phosphorus) loads
